entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 5:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
